p: Current climatic variables were download from the WorldClim database, version 1.4 [ 30] ( http://www.worldclim.org/). These climatic data represent minima, maxima and average values of monthly, quarterly, and annual ambient temperatures as well as precipitation values recorded between 1950 and 2000. All climatic variables had a spatial resolution of 2.5 arc min (approx. ~ 5 km resolution at the equator).
